channel.title: Kicad on open collector
channel.description: Recent content in Kicad on open collector

item.title: Bug Hunting (in Fedora's KiCad)
item.description: This post is a bit of a departure from the usual content here. I’m recollecting my experience working through a software bug based on intuition. Most of this has to be picked up over time, and doesn’t seem to be documented well enough (collectively) anywhere else.
